## Workspace.moveLeafToPopout() method

Migrates this leaf to a new popout window. Only works on the desktop app.

**Signature:**

```typescript
moveLeafToPopout(leaf: WorkspaceLeaf, data?: WorkspaceWindowInitData): WorkspaceWindow;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>leaf</code> | [`WorkspaceLeaf`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/WorkspaceLeaf.md) |  |
|  <code>data</code> | [`WorkspaceWindowInitData`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/WorkspaceWindowInitData.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

[`WorkspaceWindow`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/WorkspaceWindow.md)

## Exceptions

Error if the app does not support popout windows (i.e. on mobile or if Electron version is too old)
